thread.title: Lauren Conrad Shares First Baby Bump Pic, and It's Just as Cute as We Expected!
thread.title_full: Lauren Conrad Shares First Baby Bump Pic, and It's Just as Cute as We Expected!

author: Desiree Murphy
title: Lauren Conrad Shares First Baby Bump Pic, and It's Just as Cute as We Expected!
text: Lauren Conrad Shares First Baby Bump Pic, and It's Just as Cute as We Expected! by Desiree Murphy 2:33   Photo: Instagram Leave it up to Lauren Conrad to debut a picture-perfect baby bump snap! The former Hills star, who is expecting her first child with husband William Tell, gave fans a peek at her burgeoning belly via her website on Tuesday. WATCH: 10 Bombshell Confessions From Lauren Conrad During 'The Hills: That Was Then, This Is Now' Special In the sweet photo, which was also posted to Instagram, the 30-year-old fashionista rocked a nude cardigan over a striped maxi dress. Conrad looked glowing as she held her blond locks away from her face, flashing a smile while looking down at her belly. "Oh hello, cutest baby bump ever!" a caption from Team LC read. "@laurenconrad, we can't wait to meet your little bundle! ðŸ‘¶ more on laurenconrad.com." A photo posted by LaurenConrad.com (@laurenconrad_com) on Jan 10, 2017 at 12:39pm PST Conrad kicked in 2017 by announcing she was pregnant via Instagram. "Happy New Year!" she wrote alongside a photo of her sonogram. "I have a feeling 2017 is going to be the best year yet..." A photo posted by Lauren Conrad (@laurenconrad) on Jan 1, 2017 at 7:57am PST On Sunday, ET caught up with Conrad's Hills co-star, Kristin Cavallari , at NBCUniversal's Golden Globes after-party, where she couldn't stop gushing over the exciting news. "I haven't talked to [Lauren] in years, but what an exciting time in her life!" she exclaimed. "I'm so happy for her, and it's cool to see the evolution of everybody from The Hills and Laguna Beach and to see how everyone is growing up. It's been really fun to watch!" Watch below.
